question: How many natural numbers divisible by 7 are there between 3 and 200?
explanation:
Number just greater than 3 which is divisible by 7 = 7
Number just smaller than 200 which is divisible by 7 = 196
Here, a = 7, a<sub>n</sub> = 196, d = 7, n = 8
âˆ´ a<sub>n</sub> = a + (n - 1)d
=> 196 = 7 + (n - 1) $latex \\times$ 7
$latex => n - 1 = \\frac{196 - 7}{7} = 27&s=1$
=> n = 27 + 1 = 28
Hence option [B] is right answer.
